name: Robot Invasion
description:
Robot Invasion is a side-scroller adventure game where you play as a cyborg, human mixed with machine, and robots have invaded Earth.

There are tons of robots, and they are everywhere, make sure you AVOID THEM!!!

The main goal is to survive. With robots on your tail, it's not an easy task.



I used 10 years to make to make this game, it is perfect in everyway.

Thx for supporting me :P

Updates on my instagram: @Todnem123
